sentences.en: a wanton disregard for human life
Critics say he allowed the police and security forces to disregard human rights.
sentences.cn: 批评人士说他听任警察和安全部队漠视人权。

sentences.en: Disregard of these regulations will be punished.
sentences.cn: 违反这些规则者将受罚.

sentences.en: He did it in disregard of any advice.
sentences.cn: 他不顾一切劝告做了这件事.

sentences.en: He drove with blithe disregard for the rules of the road.
sentences.cn: 他开车时全然不顾交通法规。

sentences.en: He has the greatest disregard for all formality.
He ordered the jury to disregard the witness’s last statement.
sentences.cn: 他指示陪审团忽略证人的最后一句话。

sentences.en: He showed a reckless disregard for his own safety.
sentences.cn: 他对个人安危全然无所顾忌。

sentences.en: Her actions manifested a complete disregard for personal safety.
sentences.cn: 她的行动表明她全然不顾个人安危.

sentences.en: His total disregard for the feelings of others was his condemnation.
sentences.cn: 完全藐视[忽视]他人的感情是他受责难的理由.
马克完全不听我的建议。

sentences.en: She shows a total disregard for other people and their feelings.
sentences.cn: 她显然丝毫也不顾及别人以及别人的感情.

sentences.en: The administrational order was disregard of the law.
sentences.cn: 这项行政命令置法律于不顾.

sentences.en: They adopted the decision in disregard of our repeated warnings.
sentences.cn: 他们置我们的多次警告于不顾,采纳了该项决定.

sentences.en: They showed a brazen disregard for her privacy.
sentences.cn: 他们明目张胆地无视她的隐私权.

sentences.en: We cannot disregard his coming late to work so often.
sentences.cn: 对他上班经常迟到,我们不能不管.

sentences.en: You can't just disregard the security problem!
sentences.cn: 你可不能忽视安全问题.
